sentence.Network_en: A prototype of the readout electronics for BES Muon Counter is introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文介绍了BESMuon鉴别器电子学系统的原型样机.

sentence.Network_en: The Muon Counter is one of the important detectors in BES.
sentence.Network_cn: μ子探测器是安装在北京谱仪上面的重要的探测器之一.

sentence.Network_en: The reconstruction method of muon tracks in the L 3 Cosmic Ray Experiment has been studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 对L3宇宙线实验中μ子事例的动量重建方法进行了研究.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 渺子（muon）（Muon）是一种轻子，它带有 -1 的基本电荷及 1/2 的自旋。它的符号是 μ−。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: contraction of mu-meson; the particle, however, is no longer regarded as a meson

encyclopedia.content: μ子，轻子的一种，带一个单位负电，质量105.658369MeV，自旋1/2，平均寿命2.19704*10^-6s 负的muon的静质量为电子的 207 倍， 可看成超重版的电子。因此由原子核和μ子组成的原子核具有更小的库仑障壁，因而有可能在室温下发生冷聚变。正的muon的静质量为电子的九分之一。 μ子为宇宙中的π介子衰变时产生。它的半衰期为2.2微秒，主要的衰变模式为一电子、反电子中微子和μ子中微子。由于产生的μ子接近光速，因此在狭义相对论中

means.word_mean: 1. an elementary particle with a negative charge and a half-life of 2 microsecond; decays to electron and neutrino and antineutrino

auth_sentence.content: I insist that it may be an effect of the muon in the measurement process that has produced this measurement result.

auth_sentence.content: The presence of the muon obviously causes some changes in the proton even when we do not fully understand why.
auth_sentence.res_content: The presence of the muon obviously causes some changes in the proton even when we do not fully understand why.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The presence of the muon obviously causes some changes in the proton even when we do not fully understand why.

auth_sentence.content: The atomic orbit of the muon is therefore much closer to the proton than the electron's orbit in a regular hydrogen atom.
auth_sentence.res_content: The atomic orbit of the muon is therefore much closer to the proton than the electron's orbit in a regular hydrogen atom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The atomic orbit of the muon is therefore much closer to the proton than the electron's orbit in a regular hydrogen atom.
